column1: This test is used to detect infection with the fungus that causes coccidioidomycosis.
In general, the worse the infection, the higher the titer, except in people with a weakened immune system.

There can be false positive tests in patients with other fungal diseases such as histoplasmosis and blastomycosis, and false negative tests in people with single lung masseslung masses from coccidioidomycosis.
